Preview Palette Changes Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

In the Edit Controls and Functions Palette Set dialog box, select the Preview changes before saving checkbox, and select Save Changes to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to preview changes you made to the palette set.

This dialog box includes the following component:

  • Preview Saving Palette Files—Displays the name and path of the palette set you edited in the Edit Controls and Functions Palette Set dialog box.
